title: Great Mistakes: A Microscopic Discovery (Premium)
description:

Great Mistakes: A Microscopic Discovery
Tonight's episode is the first in a new series exploring historical accidents that turned out for the best. In this story, we hear about how some lackadaisical experimentation positively changed the world of medicine, forever. ğŸ˜´Â

itunes:title: Great Mistakes: A Microscopic Discovery (Premium)

itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Thomas Jones. The remarkable discovery of penicillin begins with a bit of blundersome laboratory work.
